modShortDescription: Repurposes the skull cap mod as a santa hat mod. Since this doesn't add/remove any items it can not break savegames.
modDescription:
Repurposes the skull cap mod as a santa [hat](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-clothing/) mod. Since this doesn’t add/remove any items it can not break savegames.

## Installation

* If necessary, create a folder “Mods” in **steamapps\\common\\7 Days To Die**
* Unpack ZIP into the Mods folder so that you see **steamapps\\common\\7 Days To Die\\Mods\\Gazz-RevolverSilencer** (as an example)

## Terms of Use

Go nuts. Copy or alter in any way you see fit.

**[Download](https://robert.hentschke-keramik.de/7dtd/Gazz-SantaHatMod.zip)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/26434-gazz-mods-a20/).

**Credits:** [Gazz](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/gazz/)
